document.title: How to Create a Youtube clone using react
document.description: React is an open-source JavaScript library that is used to develop interactive user interfaces. It is managed by Facebook and a community of individual developers and companies. React mainly focuses on developing single-page web or mobile applications. here, we will create a Youtube clone.
